items.sentence: I don\'t want to be the one to tell Tom that.
I don\'t want to burden you with my problems.
Tom took off his glasses and rubbed his eyes.
Are you going to be eating that piece of pie?
Are you sure you want to do that by yourself?
Tom told me that he\'d wait until I returned.
I\'m the one who recommended Tom for the job.
I\'m the only one here that can speak French.
I\'ve already explained it to Tom many times.
Did you expect something different to happen?
Do you remember the first time you kissed me?
Do you remember where you left your umbrella?
Do you sell any guidebooks written in French?
Tom is obviously upset with Mary\'s behavior.
I still have the watch you gave me years ago.
I suggest you do your job and let me do mine.
I suggest you let Tom do what he wants to do.
Tom and Mary said they probably will do that.
Tom and Mary seldom give each other presents.
Can you remember the first time you did that?
